amendment.description: Amendment sought to terminate the F-35B aircraft program and to authorize the Secretary to procure an additional number of F/A-18E or F/A-18F aircraft to replace the F-35B aircraft.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 9 printed in House Report 112-485 to terminate the F-35B aircraft program. Would authorize the Secretary to procure an additional number of F/A-18E or F/A-18F aircraft to replace the F-35B aircraft.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Conyers amendment (A009) Failed by voice vote.
